DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year age old . Need operative restorative dental procedure require local anesthesia single vital maxillary tooth ( maxillary first , second , third molar ) evidence pulpal pathology . Normal lip , nose , eyelid , cheek sensation . Able understand sign study inform consent document , communicate investigator , understand comply requirement protocol . Patency naris ipsilateral tooth undergo Study Dental Procedure . Resting heart rate ( HR ) 55 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) , inclusive . Seated systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 95 140 mm Hg , inclusive seat diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) 60 90 mm Hg , inclusive . Inadequately control hypertension ( blood pressure great 140/90 mm Hg ) . Inadequately control active thyroid disease type . Frequent nose bleeds ( â‰¥ 5 per month ) . Having receive dental care require local anesthetic within last 24 hour . History allergy intolerance tetracaine , benzyl alcohol , ester local anesthetic , paraaminobenzoic acid ( find PABAcontaining sunscreen ) . History allergy hypersensitivity articaine , oxymetazoline , epinephrine , sulfite preservative . Use monoamine oxidase inhibitor within 3 week precede study entry . Nursing , pregnant , suspected pregnant , try become pregnant . ( Females childbearing potential require take urine pregnancy test day , prior , study drug administration rule pregnancy . ) Having receive investigational drug and/or participation clinical trial within 30 day prior study participation . Having use oxymetazoline phenylephrine nasal spray , nasal irrigation , nasal oral decongestant day study procedure . History congenital idiopathic methemoglobinemia
